projects.title: MyHealth
projects.description: Full stack personal health records management application. Vue front end, FastAPI (Python) backend, postgres database, deployed on linux server using Docker containers. Features: login with OAuth2.0, REST API, CI/CD.

projects.title: PongML
projects.description: Recreate the classic game of pong, with an AI opponent. Game implemented using PyGame, AI agent implemented using OpenAI Gym. In a related project, PongApp, I implemented a live game server to play against an agent or another user on the web.
